profile_summary:
As a Senior Sales Engineer, I excel in **Technical Communication** and **Project Management**, leveraging my strong **Customer Orientation** and **Networking** skills to effectively connect with clients and deliver tailored solutions. With 8 years of experience in technology, I have a solid background in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies, enabling me to engage in insightful technical discussions.
My experience spans high-performance solution development in the healthcare and financial sectors, where I have utilized a tech stack including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I am well-versed in **cloud services** such as **Azure** and **AWS**, orchestrating the integration of AI/ML capabilities that enhance customer-focused solutions.
Additionally, I bring expertise in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with frameworks including HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. My analytical and **critical thinking** abilities allow me to navigate complex technical challenges and drive successful project outcomes. Fluent in both **German** and **English**, I effectively bridge communication gaps between technical teams and clients.
